home_job: I'm studying Software engineering. I like to do little proyects in my free time. I hope you'll like my work!
about_desc: Hi, my name is Silvia Ivón Añasco Rivadeneira. My interest for the development started when i was in high school: My former school, even if it has something call 'Bachillerato Unificado' where we supose to not specialize in any field of study (like before), it provied some 'auxiliaruras' such as gastronomy, turism and programming; I choose the last one, of course, and since then I got the desire to learn more about it. Now, I'm studying Software Engineering at 'Universidad de las Fuerzas Armadas - ESPE'.
projects_1_overview: Banana's Cocktails is a website for online promotion and sales of a traditional company.
projects_2_overview: Code Hub is a hub for code lovers in Sousse, Tunisia
projects_3_overview: Burpees.io is a solution for gyms.
projects_1_extended_overview: Banana's Cocktail arises from the need of a traditional company to embark on the world of online promotion and sales.
projects_2_extended_overview: codehub.tn is a showcase website for Code Hub: a coworking space at Sousse for developers
projects_3_extended_overview: Burpees.io is a solution for gyms. you can see plannings, take reservations and more. We've developed a white labalise app: If a client wants his native application it will be generated automatically. The dashboard is for the gym owner.
